about: A penetration tester and cloud security enthusiast with background in secure programming, security audit and compliance, network security, operating system security and vulnerability assessment. An excellent communicator and team player with a liking for sharing knowledge with the team. Skills in network and systems programming, PCAP analysis, SIEM, AWS, Azure and Scripting.
